home_info.title: Access and Explore Digital Certificates
home_info.information_paragraph: Access the Chaincerts certificate display mode by utilizing any of the preconfigured Stellar account public key listed below.

carrousel.description: The certificates displayed on this screen are 3D and interactive, you can explore and view them from different angles, as well as interact with them to obtain more information. Enjoy the experience!
